pkgmetadata.longdescription: Netgen is an automatic 3d tetrahedal mesh generator. It accepts input from CSG or BRep from STL file format. Connecting to a geometry kernel allos handling of IGES and STEP files. Netgen contains modules for mesh optimization and hierarchical mesh refinement and since version 6.x it supports python scripting.

use.flag: Compile with OpenCascade geometry kernel (not supported upstream)
